item.title: Understanding Infrakit
item.description: Docker recently open sourced new project Infrakit at ContainerCon 2016, Berlin. As project describes itself as “A toolkit for creating and managing declarative, self-healing infrastructure” Lets try to understand what it does and how it adds value to existing tools. Infrakit Problem Managing docker on different infrastructure is difficult and not portable. History Initially Docker machine project was focused for building docker environment on various platforms, but there were lot of issues mainly due to unreliable third party drivers.
